Message.Text: Tommy! I think NoSQL could really shine for this project. It's perfect for the dynamic nature of the data we’ll be working with!
Hey Frank, I hear you, but you know what? I think SQL could also work really well. It’s so reliable for structured data, and our students will get solid hands-on practice!
That’s a fair point! Though with NoSQL, they’ll get to see how schema-less designs work and handle massive scaling. That’s exciting for them, right?
You know what, maybe we can mix it up! We could even show them both approaches during the semester! That way they get the best of both worlds!
I love that idea, Tommy! This could turn into a great learning opportunity!
